errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states a requirement for an old version of the `application-properties` package (`<2.0.0`), which is not a direct project requirement and may cause unnecessary version conflicts for users.
correction_candidates: This project required Python 3.8 or later to function. It also requires `application-properties==1.5.0`.
This project required Python 3.8 or later to function. It also requires `application-properties>=2.0.0`.
This project required Python 3.8 or later to function. Please note that `application-properties` is an optional dependency.
This project required Python 3.8 or later to function.
errors.golden_answer: This project required Python 3.8 or later to function.
